column4: Dr_willis: im sorry.. im still pretty new to unix-linux-ubuntu.. i mean to say. i recently added the lubuntu and xubuntu desktops.. and they added alot to my system and slowed it down alot.. i tried to fix it by removing some of the programs from startup but im an idiot i guess..
I'm confused, do you have an error or specific problem now?
i have a specific problem.. this "recovery menu" instead of my login screen..
that's the one. continue
reinstall ?
yes?
it's busy, but I think you'll find in chan will get better results
right. sorry. what more do you have?
so something has broken those entries, grub can be fixed
can a file be replaced with one from the iso of ubuntu to fix this
no, it won't know your stuff, not that simple. You can reinstall the entire OS and it will fix it.
with a usb and unetbootin
sorry, what about them>
is that how i can reinstall??
however you got Ubuntu install media before, do that.
It will blow away everything.
Not cross OS
that too.
you couldn't get xubuntu from the software center
don't complicate the issue, do you have a CD drive?
like I said, if that's what you did before, you CAN do that.
